name: 徐曉萱
objective: This course aims at training the basic knowledge of ceramic materials and to introduce the physical/electrical properties of ceramics.  Except for strengthening the perception of traditional ceramics, it also has a systematic introduction to the application of structural ceramics and electronic ceramics.
schedule:
1. Introduction　　
2. Bonding in ceramics
3. Ceramic structures
4. Effect of chemical forces and structure in physical properties
5. Thermodynamics and kinetic considerations
6. Defects in ceramics
7. Diffusion and electrical conductivity
8. Dielectric properties
9. Applications
scorePolicy:
Mid-term Exam 35%
Final Exam 35%
Homework and  Attendance 30%
materials:
M.W Barsoum, "Fundamentals of Ceramics,"  Routledge, 2003
ISBN: 978-0750309028
